section.section: The Commission shall adopt sentencing guidelines that the Commission may change.
The sentencing guidelines shall include sentencing guidelines for ordinary sentences and sentencing guidelines for corrections options.

text.section:
The sentencing guidelines for ordinary sentences shall call for sentences within the limits set by law and shall set forth:
the range of sentences for crimes of a given degree of seriousness;
a range of increased severity for defendants previously convicted of or adjudicated delinquent for a previous crime; and
a list of aggravating and mitigating circumstances.
The sentencing guidelines for corrections options shall be designed to identify defendants qualified for corrections options programs.
